channel.title: Banks won't open, shops won't open, anything that pops up doesn't open [508]
channel.description: title says all, anyone know any reason for this? possibly my client?

item.title: Banks won't open, shops won't open, anything that pops up doesn't open [508]
item.dc:creator: @gunz4life gunz4life
item.description:
@gunz4life wrote:

footlet… you should really be nice… And it means your bank wasnt coded in your server which can be ez fix if you have a working compiler and you’ll just have a tut for it… try looking in the tut section for one and really foolet how can a mod lock this its the help section? if he advertise ect. thats another story…o and yes thier are servers who almost got full working trading with the trade screen but not 100%…

Read full topic

item.title: Banks won't open, shops won't open, anything that pops up doesn't open [508]
item.dc:creator: @xxx123xxx xxx123xxx
item.description:
@xxx123xxx wrote:

[quote=“tonypker13, post:4, topic:237925”][quote author=foolet link=topic=314162.msg2498863#msg2498863 date=1224542345]
good grief
to start you off
THERE IS NO TRADING IN 508s YET except for a selective few servers
THERE IS NO SHOPS AT ALL except for maybe a few servers
IF YOU CANT GET BANK OPENING WORKING JUST GIVE UP NOW
LOCK PLEASE?
[/quote]
You my friend are a COMPLETE IDIOT!
I’ve been on many 508’s with trading methods and shops!
gI have the trading method! Shops are just a mater of the handler! And Banking? YOUR A MORON! Thats the easiest thing you could do![/quote]
wow take it easy on him, not many people are as skilled as you, and for banking go get pali’s 3.1 updated server, has banking and basic pvp etc.
